description: This file contains unit tests for the NoteController class, verifying API endpoint behaviors such as creation, listing, and deletion of notes, with mock dependencies for service layers and security configurations.

classes.name: NoteControllerTest
classes.description: A test class for NoteController, contains test methods to verify different API behaviors

methods.name: setup
methods.description: Initial setup before each test, currently a placeholder for default headers

methods.name: create_ValidationError_BlankTitle
methods.description: Test to verify validation error when creating a note with a blank title

methods.name: list_Success
methods.description: Test to verify successful listing of notes

methods.name: delete_ForbidForUserRole
methods.description: Test to verify delete operation is forbidden for users with role 'USER'
